CH.MSG_INSTRUCTIONS: 麻雀玩法 - 麻雀有四大類型嘅牌張，包括三款序數牌(萬子、筒子、索子)，以及字牌 (東南西北中發白) - 每款序數牌都包括九個數字，例如一萬、二萬，一筒、二筒，一索、二索等等 - 每一張牌都會有四隻 - 麻雀有3種基本組合:碰(三隻同樣嘅牌)、槓(四隻同樣嘅牌)、上牌(三隻同類型且數字連續嘅序數牌) - 我地基本上採用香港麻雀嘅規則，玩家需要輪流抽牌，嘗試組合出4組(碰 / 槓 / 上牌)加1對嘅牌張，最早儲齊(食糊)嘅玩家為勝 - 為降低難度(AI太弱)，我地採用「一番起糊」嘅計分方法 - 如果想瞭解更多，可以參考 Wikipedia

EN.MSG_INSTRUCTIONS: Instructions - How to play Mahjong? (/instructions) - There are 4 suits in Mahjong, including 3 suits of ordinals (Characters/ Dots/ Bamboos) and the Honor suit (East/ South/ West/ North/ Red/ Green/ White). - Each ordinal suit consists of 9 different tiles (1 - 9). - There are 4 copies for each tile. - We can form 3 combinations (or called 'melds') of tiles in the game, including 1. Pong: 3 identical tiles, 2. Kong: 4 identical tiles, 3. Chow: 3 consecutive ordinal tiles from a suit. - Basically we follow the rule of HK Mahjong, in which players take turn to draw tile and collect 4 melds with 1 pair. The first to complete wins. - To know more, refer to Wikipedia.
